header_home.text_about: Hi! My name is Howard and I am studying Mechatronics Engineering at the University of Waterloo. This is my website I coded using React.js displaying my past projects and accomplishments.

header_projects.text_about: These are some of the cool projects I made throughout my development journey, ranging from website development to game development using a variety of languages and technologies.

projects_info.name: Ethereum Vaccine Verification App
projects_info.description: This application utilizes Blockchain and IPFS to store vaccine verification records. UI designed with React. Smart contract is deployed using Solidity.

projects_info.name: Employee Management System
projects_info.description: Using Netbeans, an interactive user interface was built to store and manipulate employee data in a hashtable.

projects_info.name: Shoot the Circles? (FPS game)
projects_info.description: The pygame library was used to develop a pseudo three-dimensional shooter.
